properties.name: allowDragging
properties.description: Specifies whether users can drag and drop the annotation.

properties.name: arrowLength
properties.description: Specifies the length of the annotation's arrow in pixels.

properties.name: arrowWidth
properties.description: Specifies the width of the annotation's arrow at its junction with the annotation rectangle.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures the appearance of the annotation's border.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies the dash style of the annotation's border.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of the annotation's border.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies the visibility of the annotation's border.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the annotation's border in pixels.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Specifies the color that fills the annotation.

properties.name: data
properties.description: A container for custom data.

properties.name: description
properties.description: Specifies the annotation's description in the [tooltip].

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies the annotation's font properties. Applies to [text annotations] only.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Specifies the annotation's height in pixels.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the image's height in pixels.

subMembers.name: image
subMembers.description: Configures the image to be displayed in the annotation. Applies only if the [type] is *"image"*.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the image's width in pixels.

properties.name: offsetX
properties.description: Moves the annotation horizontally.

properties.name: offsetY
properties.description: Moves the annotation vertically.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Specifies the annotation's opacity.

properties.name: paddingLeftRight
properties.description: Used with [paddingTopBottom] to generate an empty space around the annotation's text or image (specified in pixels).

properties.name: paddingTopBottom
properties.description: Along with [paddingLeftRight], generates an empty space around the annotation's text or image; specified in pixels.

subMembers.name: blur
subMembers.description: Specifies the blur distance of the shadows. A larger value increases the blur distance.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of the shadows.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Specifies the annotation's text. Applies only if the [type] is *"text"*.

properties.name: textOverflow
properties.description: Specifies what to do with the annotation's [text] when it overflows the allocated space after applying [wordWrap]: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

properties.name: tooltipEnabled
properties.description: Specifies whether the annotation tooltip is enabled.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies whether the annotation displays [text], an [image], or a [template]. This is a required setting.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Specifies the annotation's width in pixels.

properties.name: wordWrap
properties.description: Specifies how to wrap the annotation's [text] if it does not fit into a single line.

properties.name: x
properties.description: Used with [y] to position the annotation's center at a specific pixel coordinate. (0, 0) is the upper left corner of the UI component.

properties.name: y
properties.description: Used with [x] to position the annotation's center at a specific pixel coordinate. (0, 0) is the upper left corner of the UI component.
